_source.text: 1) Reagan 69 years, 349 days (senility affected second term) 2) William Henry Harrison, 68 years, 23 days (Died of pneumonia 32 days into his presidency -- medical care is better these days) 3) James Buchanan, 65 years, 315 days 4) George H.W. Bush, 64 years, 222 days 5) Zachary Taylor, 64 years, 100 days (died in office of stomach ailment.
